## Developers
This page was developed primarily by [Frederik M. Dam] (https://www.linkedin.com/in/frederik-dam-45aba6321/)

## Motivation

This website aims to advance research and development about Graph-Vertex Coloring, by giving users a platform where they can post, compare

## Creation

This website was developed as a part of my masters thesis in computer science, 
where the aim was to dive further into both the development of a product, while expanding the available tools for reseraching the Graph-Vertex Coloring problem.
